title: Connecting Issues
body:
Hi all,

I've used my mobile hotspot since I started playing league and I have never had any trouble, but ever since 6.2 I have had trouble connecting to a queue and even in chat, I can't even get in a queue. I got in a queue once today and I had trouble connecting to champ select but did and no lag at all in game, but I only got in queue once.....do you think somethings wrong with my client or something like that?

Thanks

replies.body: Hi I have the exact same problem, I'm currently using my Vodafone phone as a tether to play LoL and other games and everything else is running smoothly but for some reason the client refuses to stay connected and i get a PVP.net error every 30 or so seconds, my workaround at the moment is to use my other USB internet to get into a game through the client then switch over to my phone for better ping, however this is not a sustainable solution, I'm hoping its just a minor issue with Vodafone and that it will blow over soon.

Hey littletomplayz,

Please visit the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and perform all the steps listed. If possible, test it in Custom modes so you don't incur penalties. Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
